Invite your friends and get bonuses: Invite your friends and get bonuses
Telegram Stars Description: The main currency of GetBonus. Telegram Stars can be earned by completing tasks and in the Wheel of Fortune. It is used for withdrawals on Telegram, spinning the Star Wheel, and upgrading the dragon's levels.
TON Description: Cryptocurrency that can be earned as a reward from the Wheel of Fortune. Withdrawals will be available soon.
Dragons Description: In-game currency. Coins can be obtained in the 'Daily Rewards' section and by completing social tasks. Used for activating spins on the Wheel of Fortune.
Tickets Description: Tickets can be earned by completing tasks where the main reward is Telegram Stars. One ticket is equal to one spin of the Gift Wheel.
Ready to level up the dragon?: Ready to level up the dragon?

faq_steps.title: How does the referral program work?
faq_steps.subtitle_1: What do Unactivated and Activated mean?
faq_steps.subval_1_1: Unactivated — a friend you invited who hasn’t completed any tasks with a Stars reward yet. They don’t count toward your referral progress bar, but you still instantly get 1 dragon coin for them.
faq_steps.subval_1_2: Activated — a friend who has completed at least one task with reward in Stars. They count toward your referral level and help you progress.
faq_steps.subval_2_1: 1 dragon coin for every invited user — for Activated and Unactivated.
faq_steps.subval_2_2: Bonus rewards for reaching new referral levels — like tickets, dragon coins, and more.
faq_steps.subval_2_3: Referral income — from level 7, you receive a percentage of the Stars they earn. Example: if a friend earned 100 Stars, you get 2 Stars.

The referral must complete at least one: The referral must complete at least one task with a reward in TG Stars.
You don't have enough dragons for this W: You don't have enough dragon coins for this Wheel! To get coins, complete tasks or collect daily rewards!
If you have completed the task, it is be: If you have completed the task, it is being checked, and if not, you can return to completing it.
You need to set up a Telegram username t: You need to set up a Telegram username to withdraw.
After creating a withdrawal request, Tel: After creating a withdrawal request, Telegram Stars will be sent to your account within 24 hours.
To complete the output — complete the ta: To complete the output — complete the task with a reward in Stars (0/1)
The next output will be available after: The next output will be available after completing the task with a reward in Stars.
Withdraw Telegram Stars to your account: Withdraw Telegram Stars to your account
Convert your balance to real fiat: Convert your balance to real fiat
Hello! Welcome to GetBonus. My name is R: Hello! Welcome to GetBonus. My name is Red, and I'm going to quickly tell you what we have here.
Here you can monitor your balances, go t: Here you can monitor your balances, go to the withdrawal, deposit and Wheel of Fortune screen.
Here is the most pleasant part of the ap: Here is the most pleasant part of the application - tasks with a reward in Stars. Choose a task to your taste, complete it and get Stars, which you can withdraw!
This is the quest screen, here you can l: This is the quest screen, here you can learn more about the quest: rewards, instructions for completing it, and other information.
Complete tasks following the instruction: Complete tasks following the instructions in this block. Wait for verification and get your rewards!
Withdrawals! Here you can choose options: Withdrawals! Here you can choose options for withdrawing your earnings. So far, only Stars withdrawal to a telegram account is available!
By clicking this button, you will be abl: By clicking this button, you will be able to view the history of your withdrawals and their statuses.
On the dragon screen you can collect dai: On the dragon screen you can collect daily rewards, monitor the accumulation of experience for leveling up the dragon and get bonuses for them!
Get your free reward of the day - more D: Get your free reward of the day - more Dragon Coins to your piggy bank!
Great, you've already claimed your first: Great, you've already claimed your first reward! Come back every day to get even more dragon coins.
This is the rewards table, in it you can: This is the rewards table, in it you can see all the rewards that will be waiting for you after increasing the dragon levels.
You can also upgrade your dragon's level: You can also upgrade your dragon's level using Stars and receive rewards ahead of schedule.
This is your referrals screen. Invite yo: This is your referrals screen. Invite your friends by copying the link above and get bonuses for them.
By clicking this button, you can see wha: By clicking this button, you can see what rewards you will receive for reaching new levels of the referral program.
In this scale you will see only referral: In this scale you will see only referrals who have completed at least one task with a reward in Stars, for them you will receive bonuses.
Spin the Wheel to snatch a reward! Drago: Spin the Wheel to snatch a reward! Dragon Coins are waiting for you to spin.
And this is the live awards feed - here: And this is the live awards feed - here you can watch other users' awards!
Press the button and spin the Wheel!: Press the button and spin the Wheel!
